name: First Time
description:
A college-based Visual Novel  on mobile with 2 love interests and several endings.  This visual novel was developed for my Introduction to Game Programming class, as my final projects. All sounds and backgrounds are sourced (links to them are found below).

Credits:

Followed a tutorial on Ink integration by: klaudiabronowicka

Backgrounds:

  • Noraneko Games
  • UNCLE MUGEN'S FREE VN (OELVN) RESOURCES

Music

  • Freesound - "Simple lofi hip hop track n.6" by Alittlebitdrunkguy
  • Freesound - "Lazy Lo-Fi" by YellowTree

Font Used:

  • Delius from Google Fonts
